description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国商人，开国元帅叶剑英三子。曾任深圳国叶实业有限公司董事长、国基控股有限公司总裁。
description.en: A Chinese businessman, the third son of founding marshal Ye Jianying. He has served as the chairman of Shenzhen Guoye Industrial Co., Ltd. and president of Guoji Holdings Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元勋，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一。
description.en: A founding father of the People's Republic of China and one of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英的妻子之一，叶选廉和叶文珊的母亲。
description.en: One of Ye Jianying's wives, and the mother of Ye Xuanlian and Ye Wenshan.

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉的妻子，商人，长居香港，2012年因妇科癌症去世。
description.en: Ye Xuanlian's wife, a businesswoman who resided in Hong Kong, and passed away from gynecological cancer in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 中国社交名媛、歌手，曾与叶选廉有过短暂婚姻。
description.en: A Chinese socialite and singer who had a brief marriage with Ye Xuanlian.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英之女，叶选廉的同父同母妹妹。
description.en: Daughter of Ye Jianying and the full sister of Ye Xuanlian.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英长子，叶选廉同父异母的哥哥。
description.en: The eldest son of Ye Jianying and the half-brother of Ye Xuanlian.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英次子，叶选廉同父异母的哥哥。
description.en: The second son of Ye Jianying and the half-brother of Ye Xuanlian.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英之女。
description.en: Daughter of Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 时装设计师，叶选廉与苏丹丹之女。
description.en: A fashion designer, daughter of Ye Xuanlian and Su Dandan.

description.zh-cn: 香港创作歌手，Robynn & Kendy成员，叶选廉与苏丹丹之女。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer-songwriter, member of Robynn & Kendy, and daughter of Ye Xuanlian and Su Dandan.

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉与赵欣瑜之子。
description.en: Son of Ye Xuanlian and Zhao Xinyu.

description.zh-cn: 美国银行家，叶明子的丈夫。
description.en: An American banker and the husband of Ye Mingzi.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市海淀区的一所中学。
description.en: A secondary school located in Haidian District, Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市海淀区的一所中学。
description.en: A secondary school located in Haidian District, Beijing, China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部
en: General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军主管政治工作的最高领导机关，于2016年被撤销。
description.en: Formerly the chief political organ of the People's Liberation Army, it was abolished in 2016.

nodes.id: 深圳国叶实业有限公司

zh-cn: 深圳国叶实业有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由叶选廉于1992年成立的国有企业，是上市公司世纪星源的股东。
description.en: A state-owned enterprise founded by Ye Xuanlian in 1992, and a shareholder of the listed company Century Starwin.

description.zh-cn: 一家大型中央企业，业务涉及国际贸易、房地产开发等多个领域。
description.en: A large central state-owned enterprise with business covering international trade, real estate development, and other fields.

description.zh-cn: 2008年在山西注册成立的公司，业务涉及建筑、房地产、医疗卫生等产业。
description.en: A company registered in Shanxi in 2008, with business interests in construction, real estate, healthcare, and other industries.

nodes.id: 深圳市国叶世成科技发展有限公司

zh-cn: 深圳市国叶世成科技发展有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由叶选廉于2007年注册的香港独资公司，针对高科技绿色能源产业。
description.en: A Hong Kong wholly-owned company registered by Ye Xuanlian in 2007, focusing on the high-tech green energy industry.

description.zh-cn: 香港女子音乐组合。
description.en: A Hong Kong female musical duo.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市房山区下辖的地区。
description.en: An area under the jurisdiction of Fangshan District, Beijing, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京天安门东侧，曾是明清两代皇帝祭奠祖先的家庙。
description.en: Located east of Tiananmen in Beijing, it was the imperial ancestral temple where emperors of the Ming and Qing dynasties worshiped their ancestors.

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉是叶剑英的三子。
description.en: Ye Xuanlian is the third son of Ye Jianying.

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉是李刚的儿子。
description.en: Ye Xuanlian is the son of Li Gang.

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉与苏丹丹为夫妻关系，直至苏丹丹于2012年去世。
description.en: Ye Xuanlian and Su Dandan were married until her death in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 赵欣瑜于2014年1月宣布与叶选廉结束为期2年的婚姻关系。
description.en: Zhao Xinyu announced the end of her 2-year marriage to Ye Xuanlian in January 2014.

description.zh-cn: 叶文珊是叶选廉同父同母的妹妹。
description.en: Ye Wenshan is Ye Xuanlian's full sister.

description.zh-cn: 叶选平是叶选廉同父异母的哥哥。
description.en: Ye Xuanping is Ye Xuanlian's half-brother.

description.zh-cn: 叶选宁是叶选廉同父异母的哥哥。
description.en: Ye Xuanning is Ye Xuanlian's half-brother.

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉是中国共产党员。
description.en: Ye Xuanlian is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1963年至1966年就读于北京十一学校甲一班小学。
description.en: Attended Beijing No. 11 School's Class A1 primary school from 1963 to 1966.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉曾入伍在解放军总政治部担任飞行员。
description.en: Ye Xuanlian enlisted and served as a pilot in the PLA General Political Department.

relationships.target: 深圳国叶实业有限公司
深圳国叶实业有限公司

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉是深圳国叶实业有限公司的法人，该公司于1992年成立。
description.en: Ye Xuanlian is the legal representative of Shenzhen Guoye Industrial Co., Ltd., which was established in 1992.

relationships.target: 深圳市国叶世成科技发展有限公司

description.zh-cn: 叶选廉是深圳市国叶世成科技发展有限公司的法人，该公司于2007年注册。
description.en: Ye Xuanlian is the legal representative of Shenzhen Guoye Shicheng Technology Development Co., Ltd., which was registered in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 叶明子于2009年9月9日在北京太庙与Jonathan Mork结婚。
description.en: Ye Mingzi married Jonathan Mork at the Beijing Imperial Ancestral Temple on September 9, 2009.
